abstractText: In the published version of the article, the acknowledgment section wrongly states that Prof. Bernhard Schink (University of Konstanz, Germany) and Prof. Aharon Oren (The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel) corrected the description of the protologues of the newly reported Rhodopirellula strains. This is not true. They never saw nor advised on the protologues. Our sincere apologies for this mistake. Mike Jetten, PhD Editor-in-Chief

sections.text:
Vol.: (0123456789)
Correction to: Revisiting the taxonomy of the genus Rhodopirellula with the proposal for reclassifcation of the genus to Rhodopirellula sensu stricto, Aporhodopirellula gen. nov., Allorhodopirellula gen. nov. and Neorhodopirellula gen. nov
Pannikurungottu Sreya · Gandham Suresh · Anusha Rai · Biswas Ria · Lakshmanan Vighnesh · Vaibhav Chandrakant Agre · Uppada Jagadeeshwari · Chintalapati Sasikala · Chintalapati Venkata Ramana
Published online: 15 March 2023 © Springer Nature Switzerland AG 2023
Publisher’s Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations. Correction to: Antonie van Leeuwenhoek (2023) 116:243–264 https://doi.org/10.1007/s10482-022-01801-0
In the published version of the article, the acknowledgment section wrongly states that Prof. Bernhard Schink (University of Konstanz, Germany) and Prof. Aharon Oren (The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel) corrected the description of the protologues of the newly reported Rhodopirellula strains. This is not true. They never saw nor advised on the protologues. Our sincere apologies for this mistake. Mike Jetten, PhD Editor-in-Chief
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s10482- 022- 01801-0.
P. Sreya · G. Suresh · A. Rai · B. Ria · L. Vighnesh · V. C. Agre · C. V. Ramana (*)  Department of Plant Sciences, School of Life Sciences, University of Hyderabad, P.O. Central University, Hyderabad 500 046, India e-mail: cvr449@gmail.com
U. Jagadeeshwari · C. Sasikala (*)  Bacterial Discovery Laboratory, Centre for Environment, IST, JNT University Hyderabad, Kukatpally, Hyderabad 500 085, India e-mail: sasi449@yahoo.ie

title: Correction to: Revisiting the taxonomy of the genus Rhodopirellula with the proposal for reclassifcation of the genus to Rhodopirellula sensu stricto, Aporhodopirellula gen. nov., Allorhodopirellula gen. nov. and Neorhodopirellula gen. nov
